column2: "Ah, what good timing running into you! This makes Lisa happy. Hehehe."
"Earlier, Lisa had her first conversation, you know? With the natives of this place. Amazing, aren't they? Wonderful, aren't they?"
"Don't you think it's wonderful that they understand the words that ARKS use?"
"After all, the words used by Lisa and others are quite complex, you know?"
"How do they decipher all those words with such small bodies and equally small minds? Lisa hasn't the foggiest clue."
"But but but! The fact that they can speak could be surprisingly interesting, you know?"
"Lisa's really had to restrain herself from finding out what sort of sound they'd make if they got shot."
"Hehe! Come on, tell Lisa how proud you are of her!"
"If you don't, she might end up shooting them next time, you know?"
